_comment: MCP server configuration template for Atelier. Copy the 'mcpServers' block into your project's .claude/settings.json or your global ~/.claude/settings.json. Replace all <PLACEHOLDER> values with your actual credentials.

atlassian._comment_server: Atlassian MCP server for Jira and Confluence. Provides tools: mcp__atlassian__getJiraIssue, mcp__atlassian__getConfluencePage, mcp__atlassian__getJiraIssueRemoteIssueLinks.

env._comment_jira_url: Your Atlassian instance URL. Find it in your browser address bar when logged into Jira (e.g., https://yourcompany.atlassian.net).
env._comment_confluence_url: Usually the same as your Jira URL. Only set separately if your Confluence is on a different domain.
env._comment_email: The email address associated with your Atlassian account.
env._comment_token: Atlassian API token. Generate one at: https://id.atlassian.com/manage-profile/security/api-tokens. Store securely -- do NOT commit this file with a real token.

github._comment_server: GitHub MCP server (optional). The gh CLI is usually sufficient for GitHub issues and PRs. Only add this if you need richer GitHub integration beyond what gh provides.

env._comment_token: GitHub personal access token. Generate one at: https://github.com/settings/tokens. Needs 'repo' scope for private repos.
